##### To create knockout SPA template run these commands in CMD in root of an empty ASP.NET Core web application 	
	*dotnet new --install Microsoft.AspNetCore.SpaTemplates::*  - instalira sve Spa template
	*dotnet add package Microsoft.AspNetCore.SpaTemplates --version 2.0.7
	*dotnet new knockout - instalira template za knockout
	*npm install
	*npm install -g npm-check-updates  ! Only if you dont have it installed
	*npm-check-updates
	*ncu -u
	*npm install 


#### Check tsconfig.json
#### Add ClientApp/_autogenerated (_models.tst, _services.tst)
#### Add ClientApp/fetchHelper



##### IDP Config. #####
	* Enable SSL
